author: manunlp
content:
Hi,

I'm trying to add validators on the Ropsten testnet.

Here is what I've done so far:
I added two keys using  https://ropsten.launchpad.ethereum.org/.
Pubkeys are:
- b12b7817992475dc5fb80bf9f0a9c7df714a2c281fe4aad76e08537e67d87490e03bc475cadb0dde8095a49d7b4d2bb1
- b1ee598a2b5cfb64bd2b7cb920d110ccd79dde919f9299351e17c95a3154ae7a4760885335ed1b2b7bc93b1bfbd9e0ff

Deposits transactions are visible here: https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x41bf11070c3a7d4a3dfc6356b0ad8026d921096d150a79a1bb8f7eaadde35db7 https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x745c34d3f71f647ba4a31fb0417ca7944eb9b81df9fdbd834b9f782c87446efe

Neither of these 2 validators are visible on beaconchai.ai nor on beaconscan.

When I try to get validator status by directly calling my Prysm beacon node, I get that:

```
curl ropsten-prysm-beacon-0-rpc.ethereum-common:3500/eth/v1/beacon/states/head/validators/0xb1ee598a2b5cfb64bd2b7cb920d110ccd79dde919f9299351e17c95a3154ae7a4760885335ed1b2b7bc93b1bfbd9e0ff

{"message":"Could not find validator","code":404}
```

And everything is OK when I try to get validator status of a validator registered at genesis (example `0x8000627ec510b47af72626645658f10a0c235f2b338f73dba5d80977f994c2e146b71fc68ffdd3fcc30f9aead8b41a5b`)

Additional information: I do not see any new validator added after genesis (but maybe I missed something)

Did I do something wrong?

author: stevencook
content: <@531934490826768418> i see your validator in my deposit_cache on lighthouse

author: stevencook
content:
Unfortunately we are waiting for the active validators to come to consensus about what the right reference block and deposit count is. Each voting period lasts 2048 *slots (~6.5 hours) and the one that completed about 30 minutes ago didn't come to agreement (> 50%) yet
```
votes  percent  block_hash_value
1012   49.41    0xb12db16e819f03f4d605e8d59eb166c50a56cb6f1c2af4ac5fa95825d1597556[354]
746    36.42    0xeefb1f70bf7bed6394ed7d6f812f422aa37bf7680e1b75fa551d40e849f10a87[0]
232    11.32    0xfd9f44982d0ccb0d07f45bdfabf4f299baba0b144c51402ef738d54e4e42b06a[354]
50     2.441    empty[0]

Cycle is 100% Complete. There are 0 blocks remaining.
```
